name: Societatea Nationala de Stiinta si Ingineria Mediului
goal:
The objectives and the national and international goals of the SNSIM professional association:
- the creation of an institutional framework for internal communication and dialogue between all members of society
- improve the legal framework in the area of environment protection and climate changes, in cooperation with public institutions
- to create the conditions for achieving success and efficiency of the activities specific to the field of science, engineering and environmental protection
- creating interdisciplinary teams of experts from among members of the Association, intended to provide solutions to the particular problems of areas of nature Sciences, engineering and environmental management programmes of technical assistance, consultancy, development projects and technological solutions to the proposal requesting the various beneficiaries: civil society, non-governmental organizations, administration, universities, schools and research in the context of European cooperation
- promotion of applicative research as a source of practical solutions to the problems of contemporary society, including the problem of the global climate changes,
- creating a complete database, accessible for the science and environmental engineering; the database should be useful for the legislation regarding the environment protection
- modernization of the educational process in universities or other institutions, regardless of their level, based on collaborative programs for the development of education through projects
- organizing debates, seminars, forums, symposiums, conferences in the field of environmental protection and climate changes; organizing an annual International Conference underway in Romania and abroad in locations agreed upon by its members
- the development of environmental studies and reports in science, engineering, and environmental protection
- advisory services and expertise for the purposes of studies, analyses, monitoring, evaluations, and other similar activities in the field of science, engineering, and environmental protection
- promotion of techniques, technologies, products and advanced equipment to international standards imposed quotas in science, engineering, and environmental protection;
- educational activities and consultancy
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Education and training, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
